item.title: Threads concepts
item.description: Concepts 1) Thread creation There are two ways to create threads Extending a thread class Implementing a Runnable interface It is recommended to use runnable interfaces because, class can extend only a single class because of the Java’s lack of support to multiple inheritence, but a class can implement multiple interfaces.
